info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 16 at 7:06PM CDT until June 16 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Twin Cities/Chanhassen MN
info.description:
TORMPX
The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a
* Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Blue Earth County in south central Minnesota... Southwestern Le Sueur County in south central Minnesota... Southeastern Nicollet County in south central Minnesota...
* Until 745 PM CDT.
* At 706 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located near North Mankato, or 5 miles northwest of Mankato, moving east at 30 mph.
HAZARD...Damaging tornado and half dollar size hail.
SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado southeast of Nicollet.
IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely.
* Locations impacted include... Mankato, North Mankato, St. Peter, Eagle Lake, Madison Lake, Mankato Airport and Lake Jefferson.
info.instruction: Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a well-built building away from windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.

parameter.value: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 7:45 PM CDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: TORNADO WARNING in this area until 7:45 PM CDT. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Check media.

area.areaDesc: Blue Earth, MN; Le Sueur, MN; Nicollet, MN

parameter.value: SNM:AVISO DE TORNADO hasta las 7:45 PM CDT. Refugiese ahora. Consulte medios informativos

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORNADO en efecto hasta las 7:45 PM CDT. Busque refugio ahora en un sotano o en el interior de un cuarto en el nivel mas bajo de un edificio seguro. Si esta al aire libre, en una casa movil, o en un vehiculo, debe ir al edificio seguro mas cercano y protegerse de proyectiles. Consulte los medios informativos.

area.areaDesc: Blue Earth, MN; Le Sueur, MN; Nicollet, MN
